video.title: How To Make a Website With WordPress (Beginners Tutorial)

✏️ This course was developed by Beau Carnes.

🎉 Hostinger provided a grant that made this course possible.

replies.author: dexternepo
replies.text:
WordPress gives us the option to quickly setup a website. It has various themes to choose from and one can also code and customize a wordpress site. 
Wordpress is a CMS (Content Management System) and such customised CMSes are used by News agencies like CNN or Fox where multiple reporters can login and submit their news article. Journalists are not programmers  and they don't need to know coding to publish their articles in a web page. That is a big use case for WordPress.
But it is important to know how to code a website from scratch otherwise you can't customise a Wordpress website. 
If the website you build is small and it is required for a company that is not going to publish anything on their site frequently, then WordPress is not really needed. I am not saying WordPress should not be used, it can be, but it is not a big use case for WordPress.
